description: Detects Wscript/Cscript executing a file with an uncommon (i.e. non-script) extension
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Cscript/Wscript Uncommon Script Extension Execution
query: (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:(/[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (process.executable:(/.*\\\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\\\[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))) AND process.command_line:(/.*\.[Cc][Ss][Vv].*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc].*/ OR /.*\.[Gg][Ii][Ff].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Pp][Ee][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Jj][Pp][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Nn][Gg].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Pp][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Tt][Xx][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss].*/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Mm][Ll].*/))
